testCase.name: validateOCPPMessage should return false if data is not provided
validateOCPPMessage should validate anything with given schema
OCPP CALL .parseOCPPMessage parses a BootNotification into OCPP CALL
OCPP CALL .parseOCPPMessage parses a Heartbeat into OCPP CALL
OCPP CALL Can create CALL_RESULT from CALL
OCPP CALL Returns RPC format for BootNotification
OCPP CALL Returns RPC format for Heartbeat
OCPP CALL Construct CALL via constructor
OCPP CALL_RESULT constructs {"messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 3, "payload": [Object]}
OCPP CALL_RESULT constructs {"messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 3, "payload": [Object]}
OCPP CALL_RESULT Returns RPC format for {"action": "BootNotification", "messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 2, "payload": [Object]}
OCPP CALL_RESULT Returns RPC format for {"action": "Heartbeat", "messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 2, "payload": [Object]}
OCPP CALL_ERROR constructs GenericError
OCPP CALL_ERROR constructs InternalError
OCPP CALL_ERROR Returns RPC format for {"errorCode": "GenericError", "errorDescription": "Some description", "errorDetails": [Object], "messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 4}
OCPP CALL_ERROR Returns RPC format for {"errorCode": "InternalError", "errorDescription": "", "errorDetails": [Object], "messageId": "1234", "messageTypeId": 4}
OCPP CALL_ERROR Construct CALL_ERROR via constructor can omit messageId and errorDetails
OCPPMessage validation validate RPC message BootNotification
OCPPMessage validation validate RPC message Heartbeat
